title: Can't login on my main account, but I can on my alt??
body: I'm just confused, I know there are already quite a few posts on this, but I'm going to add to the pile lol.

replies.body: Logging on on your alt may have been a coincidence.  The platform is currently down for maintenance per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page so players are having issues logging in.  Hang tight until things clear up, and let me know if you still have an issue then.

Now I keep getting a message saying "Something's wrong with our servers and it's not allowing you to patch. . ." (Error Code 003)
The logging in problem is resolved though.
